editorialSummary.text: Elegant rooms & suites in an upscale hotel with 2 restaurants, an outdoor pool & a spa.

text.text:
I had a very disappointing and frustrating experience during my recent stay at Taj Mahal Lucknow (26th–27th August).

After using the swimming pool, I went to the gym shower where I found no hair oil, wet slippers, no laundry bag, and even the telephone was not working. There was also no staff present to assist. I had to use my personal phone to request hair oil, slippers, and a laundry bag. Even though I was assured multiple times that items were being sent, nobody ever came, and I wasted 30+ minutes waiting.

Worse, when I returned later from my meeting, I discovered that hotel staff had accessed my room without my permission. This is a serious breach of privacy and security, completely unacceptable in any hotel—let alone one under the Taj brand.

Despite escalating this matter to the duty manager, there was no proper resolution or accountability. The service was unprofessional, careless, and far below the standards one expects from a 5-star property.

I chose Taj Mahal Lucknow for its reputation, but my experience was extremely disappointing. I hope the management takes this complaint seriously and ensures no other guest faces such negligence and breach of trust.

text.text:
Taj in its true essence. Absolute joy of the entire experience.

Rooms are splendid. Especially the ones facing the pool area. The hotel lobby personifies the Palace feel. Stairs going down the pool and recreation area have statues and paintings depicting old culture. One has to see them to believe this.

I haven't seen a better house phone booth ever in any hotel and telling you by the experience of staying across the World. House phone booth has statues in local dresses and you have to see them to believe it.

The swimming pool looks like it is from the Mughal era. There is a water fountain inside and around it.

The whole experience is truly like staying in a palace from the bygone era.

Food, whether it is in room dining or buffet, is flavourful and perfect. The buffet might have less to choose from but what is there is good.

Have stayed there quite a few times and it is a must to experience if you are in Lucknow on a visit.

text.text:
Taj Mahal, Lucknow is a perfect blend of luxury, tradition, and impeccable hospitality. From the moment you walk in, you're welcomed with warm smiles and top-notch service. The architecture and interiors reflect the rich cultural heritage of Lucknow, with elegant decor and thoughtful details throughout.

Rooms are spacious, well-appointed, and offer every comfort you'd expect from a premium hotel. The gardens and pool area are beautifully maintained, creating a peaceful and relaxing atmosphere.

The dining experience is exceptional—especially the Awadhi cuisine served at their in-house restaurant. Every dish is full of authentic flavors, beautifully presented, and served with care.

Whether you're in Lucknow for business or leisure, the Taj Mahal offers a truly memorable stay. Highly recommended for anyone looking to experience luxury with a local touch.

text.text:
**Subject: Extremely Disappointed with Taj Lucknow Service**

This is not my first stay at a Taj property, but unfortunately, my experience at *Taj Lucknow* has been the worst so far. Despite repeated complaints over the past **hour** regarding a non-functional AC, no effective action was taken until I escalated the issue to the **Duty Manager**. The lack of urgency and professionalism from the staff here is completely unacceptable.

To make matters worse, my earlier request to room service was mishandled with **incorrect food orders**—further reflecting the poor service standards at this property. Even stirrer wasn’t available with Tea!!

In contrast, my stays at Taj properties in **Patna, Bangalore, and other cities** have consistently been excellent. It’s disappointing to see such a stark drop in quality at Taj Lucknow. Guests choose Taj for its reputed service—sadly, this location does not live up to that promise.

**Think twice before booking**

text.text:
Warm and Welcoming Staff: Guests consistently highlight the friendliness and helpful attitude of the staff across all departments, from reception to housekeeping and restaurant service. Many specifically mention staff going the extra mile to ensure a seamless experience, with names like Himanshu Singh and Priyanka praised for their professionalism and care.

Spotless & Comfortable Rooms: The rooms are often described as immaculate, spacious, and comfortable. Housekeeping is prompt and maintains high standards of hygiene, making the rooms feel inviting and well-kept.

Excellent Food & Breakfast: Travelers love the food quality, especially the extensive breakfast buffet that offers both Indian and western cuisine. Many guests point out the delicious variety, while also appreciating the attentive service in the hotel's restaurants.

Prime Location: Hyatt Regency is situated in Gomti Nagar, one of Lucknow's best areas for accessing business, government offices, and leisure spots. The location is often cited as convenient and close to major city attractions.

Exceptional Hospitality: The overall experience at Hyatt Regency Lucknow earns frequent praise. Many note smooth check-in, warm greetings, and thoughtful touches such as packed breakfasts for guests with early departures. Multiple guests say the hotel's standards match those of Hyatt properties worldwide.

Modern Amenities & Facilities: The property is described as well-appointed with comprehensive amenities, including a well-maintained pool, fitness center, and event spaces. Guests enjoy the ambiance and overall atmosphere, describing it as both inviting and peaceful.

Value for Money: Though some reviewers note the hotel is on the pricier side, they generally feel it is justified by the level of comfort, service, and quality provided.

Repeat Visits and Recommendations: Many travelers express their intention to return and recommend the hotel to others, noting that their experiences have been consistently positive across multiple stays.

In conclusion, Hyatt Regency Lucknow is highly recommended for its exceptional staff, spotless and comfortable rooms, delicious food, and prime location, making it a favorite for both business and leisure travelers to the city

text.text:
I had high expectations from the Independence Day lunch buffet at Renaissance, especially given the premium pricing of ₹2000 per person. Unfortunately, the experience was quite disappointing.

The buffet lacked both variety and taste. The spread felt very ordinary, with nothing that stood out or justified the festive occasion. For such a reputed property, I was expecting more creativity, better flavors, and at least some signature dishes, but the food was bland and repetitive.

On the positive side, the ambience and service were decent, but ac was not working and when you go for a buffet, the food should be the highlight—and here it clearly wasn’t. Overall, not worth the price charged.

text.text:
Not Worth the Price – Disappointed by Service Despite Good Rooms

I stayed recently at Hilton Garden Inn, Lucknow, and while the cleanliness and room quality were quite good, these basics are expected at any decent hotel—especially when you’re paying premium rates for a 4-5 star property.

Unfortunately, the overall service was disappointing:

Room service was very poor. Whether it was a simple request like a Band-Aid or anything else, nothing came without repeated calls.

One evening it was raining heavily and no Ola/Uber was available. I was just 850 meters away and requested the hotel to help with a pickup. They refused, giving excuses, which was surprising for a brand like Hilton.

During dining, the staff seemed more focused on reminding guests to pay the bill rather than offering a warm dining experience. At least four staff members came, one after the other, just to remind me to settle the bill. No one even asked how the food was.

At check-out, I politely asked if I could go back to the room for a quick change of clothes, or if they could provide a small space. The response was a blunt “you can use the restroom, no other place will be allowed.” Not something you'd expect from a hospitality-first brand.

While the property itself is well-maintained, the staff attitude and service levels need serious improvement. I truly hope the management addresses these issues so future guests have a better experience.

text.text:
Food Quality and Service:

The overall quality of the food was subpar. Many attendees tasted the food but left their plates unfinished. Notably, chapatis were not served, and soup was unavailable. The excessive use of garlic in the dishes was also a common complaint among guests.

The food service appeared disorganized, giving the impression that it was complimentary rather than part of a paid event.

Service Staff Availability:

There was a noticeable lack of service staff attending to our VIP guests. Despite prior requests, no one approached them to offer tea, coffee, or other refreshments. We had to assign our own staff to ensure our guests were attended to appropriately.

Lack of Banquet Infrastructure:
Normally when we do our events at Taj, Lucknow, there is no dearth of front row sofas there. We had to struggle to find 6 wooden chairs at max, around 10 am, after the start of our program, to be placed for our special guests. When hotels like your offer such experience and availability of paraphernalia, it seems like a waste of money and trust bestowed.

This experience was disappointing.

From an unhappy client, best regards:

text.text:
Dear Hotel Holiday Inn Team,

I am writing to share my recent experiences at your hotel, which have raised concerns about the food safety and hygiene standards. On August 12th, around 22:35, I dined at your evening buffet and was served Chicken Malai. Unfortunately, upon inspecting the dish, I found a hair in it. I immediately brought this to the attention of the Floor Chef and Duty Manager, who took the issue seriously and apologized for the inconvenience.

The Chef and Duty Manager offered to replace the dish, but given the nature of the issue, I decided not to continue with my meal. As a guest, it's unsettling to encounter such an incident, and it raises questions about the quality control measures in place.

Furthermore, I had a similar experience the previous day when I requested your floor team to send some fresh dishes from the buffet to my room as I returned late from a site visit. To my surprise, I received leftover food from the buffet, which was not what I had requested. This incident not only raised concerns about food handling but also made me question whether the hotel was prioritizing cost savings over serving fresh food to guests.

While I appreciate the prompt response from the Chef and Duty Manager regarding the hair incident, these experiences collectively raise concerns about the overall food safety and hygiene standards at your hotel. I understand that mistakes can happen, but I hope you'll take this feedback constructively and review your quality control processes to ensure the highest standards of food safety and hygiene.

I hope that you will take my feedback seriously and take necessary actions to address these concerns. I look forward to hearing from you and seeing improvements in your Service.

text.text:
Here are The Piccadily Hotel, Lucknow showcasing its elegant exterior, pool area, and interior ambiance.

---

The Piccadily Hotel, Lucknow: Overview & Key Features

Location & Ambience

Located in Sector B, LDA Colony, Kanpur Road, just 5–10 minutes from the Lucknow airport and around 7 km from Hazratganj, the hotel offers easy access to both travel hubs and city shopping areas.

The entrance features a grand driveway leading into a plush lobby with royal décor and comfortable leather seating, creating a luxurious, welcoming vibe.

Rooms

The hotel offers a range of neat and spacious rooms:

Superior Twin/King, Executive Twin/King, Luxury Rooms, Suites, Luxury Suites, and a Presidential Suite (sizes ranging from ~30 sq m to 92 sq m), all with complimentary Wi-Fi.

Rooms are equipped with amenities like satellite TV, minibar, tea/coffee maker, electronic safe, direct-dial phone, and well-appointed bathrooms including hair dryers, in both standard and suite categories.

Front Office & Guest Services

The front office is known for its friendliness and efficiency—guests regularly praise staff members like Monika, Mudrika, Mahima, Mr. Pandey, and others for their warm hospitality and helpfulness during check-in and throughout the stay.

Additional services include airport/rail transfers, housekeeping, laundry, currency exchange, travel desk, doctor on call, salon, gym, spa, and more—all adding to a seamless stay experience.

Front Elevation & Aesthetic

The hotel's exterior is imposing and polished, backed by well-maintained grounds. The images show a stately façade in red brick tones, and a well-designed pool area that enhances its upscale character.

Security & Guardian

While explicit security staff details aren't highlighted in listings, the hotel’s reputation as a premium business-class property with 24-hour reception and organized services implies professional security protocols and a safe environment throughout.

Rooftop Garden / Venue Space

The hotel features a Terrace: an attractive outdoor venue suited for weddings and social events, accommodating up to **350 seated

5/5 – Royal Comfort at Saraca Lucknow! ⭐

Saraca Lucknow is truly one of the finest luxury hotels in the city. From the moment you step in, you're welcomed with elegance, sophistication, and heartfelt hospitality.

🏨 Rooms: Spacious, clean, and beautifully designed with a royal Awadhi touch. The comfort level is top-notch, making you feel like royalty!

🤝 Service: The staff is incredibly polite and professional. Every request is handled with care and efficiency. You’ll always be greeted with a smile.

📍 Location: Situated in a prime area of Lucknow, the hotel is close to major attractions yet offers peace and calm within its premises.

🍽️ Food: The dining experience is exceptional! From local Lucknowi cuisine to international dishes, every bite is flavorful and authentic.

Overall, Saraca Lucknow offers the perfect blend of luxury, comfort, and culture. Highly recommended for anyone visiting the city – whether for business or leisure. A truly royal experience! 🌟

text.text:
Centrum, Lucknow is not just a hotel—it’s an experience.

As part of my professional duties, I travel extensively—almost half the month. While India is home to many remarkable properties in the hospitality space, Centrum stands apart. The thought, design, construction, and overall experience are truly novel.

From what I could gather, the architecture beautifully blends stone, wood, and metal, creating an ambiance that is earthy, humble, and yet grand. The staff is exceptionally friendly, the food is thoughtfully curated, and every detail reflects a deep sense of care.

A wonderful property—superbly designed. I would love to return.

Orchid restaurant @Fortune Hotel Jopling Road is a fine dine restaurant for in house hotel guests as well as open to outside diners as well.
We went in group for weekend lunch to this restaurant which serves both Indian as well as Continental stuff.
This time we all wanted to have Continental stuff and particularly the grill platters.We ordered Grilled chicken,Grilled Paneer and Grilled Fish platters.
The food was good and the chicken platter stood out with mashed potatoes and dip.
The Grilled paneer was slightly bland and required some extra salt and black pepper as per our taste, though cooked well.
The meal was washed with peach ice tea.
A hearty meal!

text.text:
As always have been told, all is good that end good, so starting with the good things.
Rooms was nice, spacious, proper amenities inside room with a locker too. The location is great from railway station, airport and all the older food joints of Lucknow. Quite ambience inside the hotel too. Good things ends here.
Bathroom has been leaking, so no point of wet and dry area. The water mixer was broken, had to use it in the last adjusted setting which was super hot for August. The commode too was leaking. Had to wait for 1 hour 30 minutes before a room was allotted. We were told initially to wait for 30 minutes, waited patiently, then 15 minutes, towards the it got me, went to the counter and asked them how much more, said 10 minutes and the saga continues. They have been constantly saying that "Sorry we are fully booked that's why the delay". We are not staying free, people pay, so if booked fully manage your workforce, instead of placing 1 intern and 1 front desk guy. Yes, I accept we reached early at 12.45 PM, and the check-in time was officially 2 PM, but we also have informed that at the time of booking itself. Should have responded then and there. We could have booked something else. Worst service I have ever seen in the same category of hotels. And moreover if you need time, spill it out at once not like 30 minutes, 15 minutes and continuing. Paying at a hotel and then waiting for 1 hour 30 minutes for the room is nonsense.

Overall, it was the worst hotel experience I’ve had. Not recommended at all.

I had a very disappointing experience at this hotel. Despite claiming to be a four-star property, the standards were far below even basic expectations.

Cleanliness: The hotel lacked basic hygiene. The rooms were dirty and had a bad odor, making the stay very uncomfortable.

Staff Behavior: The staff was untrained and unprofessional. They did not even know how to greet guests properly, which is very concerning for a hotel of this claimed standard.

Room Condition: The AC in the room was not working properly. I raised the issue at the reception, but there was no response or follow-up. The room condition overall was poor and not well-maintained.

Service: There was no promptness or courtesy in their service. Complaints were ignored, and no effort was made to improve the situation.

Overall, this was one of the worst hotel stays I have ever experienced. I would strongly advise others to avoid this place. It does not live up to its advertised rating and feels more like a fraud than a professional establishment.

text.text:
I checked in today for a two-night stay in their suite with a bathtub. My flight landed at 7 AM, and I had already spoken to the hotel beforehand requesting an early check-in. Unfortunately, despite the room being vacant, we were made to wait two hours before being given the keys. I understand hotel policies may not allow early check-in more than four hours before standard time, but what was disappointing was that even during those two hours in the lobby, it took them an hour just to serve us a glass of water.

The suite itself is spacious, with two bathrooms, a sitting area, and a bedroom. However, I learned that the property is 15 years old, and it shows. The room has wooden paneling on all walls, but the storage space is limited—just one cupboard, which is inadequate for even two people. The mattress was slightly smaller than the bed, affecting the aesthetics. The room had a musty smell, like it hadn’t been aired out in a while. The bathroom is large with a bathtub, but the fittings, mirror, and toilet look old and in need of replacement. There was no hot water during my first day. The French windows in both the bedroom and sitting area have visible water stains, which affect the view. Outside the room, the passageway has water dripping from the roof, possibly from AC vents.

I requested a room freshener to deal with the musty smell, but it never arrived. The reception staff were polite but not particularly warm—everything was handled in a matter-of-fact way without much hospitality.

On the positive side, the location is excellent—right in the Hazratganj area, close to all major tourist spots in Lucknow. I’ve only stayed one night so far, so let’s see how tomorrow goes.

Great location and well-designed rooms — the bathrooms were clean and had all the essentials. That’s where the good part ends.

The staff was rude and completely unwelcoming, which really ruined the experience.From the moment we checked in, there was this coldness — no warmth, no sense of hospitality. It genuinely felt like they were doing us a favour by letting us stay there. On top of that, there were frequent power cuts, and no one seemed bothered or apologetic about it.

For the price and reputation, I expected basic courtesy and smoother service. Disappointed.
It’s frustrating because the property has potential. But if you're looking for a pleasant, smooth, and welcoming experience — I’d suggest looking elsewhere unless they seriously work on their service and basic infrastructure.

text.text:
I am writing to express my disappointment with my recent experience at Regenta Central Lucknow, which marks the second time I have felt let down by your services.
During this stay, I faced significant inconvenience due to non-functional air conditioning. Despite changing rooms three times, I was not provided a room with a properly working AC:

Room 4115 – AC was completely non-functional.

Room 4114 – AC not cooling, no fridge, broken mirror, faulty flush, and several non-working lights.

Room 4112 – AC worked for about 2 hours and then stopped cooling altogether.

While the staff was courteous and tried to be supportive, they were unable to resolve the issue. I now understand why each room has a ceiling fan — seemingly to compensate for malfunctioning AC units, which is not expected at this price point or standard of service.

This follows an earlier disappointing experience:
Last year, I had to cancel my booking due to a sudden family emergency. I had informed the management in good faith and was verbally assured a credit for a future stay, with no terms discussed at the time. However, when I reached out 10 months later to utilize that credit, I was told that the credit validity was only 3 months — a condition that was never communicated earlier. Despite multiple requests, not even a complimentary meal was offered as a goodwill gesture.

Both experiences reflect poorly on guest service and post-booking support. I hope you will take this feedback seriously and work toward improving both the maintenance of your property and transparency in guest communication.

text.text:
I recently stayed at Regenta Central, Lucknow, and while I truly appreciated the hospitality and responsiveness of the staff, I feel compelled to point out some issues that need urgent attention.

We had booked the **Royal Suite**, but unfortunately, the **AC wasn’t working**. I requested the staff to look into it, and they tried their best, but eventually had to **shift us to another room**. The new room was quite nice, with good interiors and overall ambiance — but the **AC again was not up to the mark**.

Additionally, **hot water wasn’t available in the tap**, and even after waiting for a long time, it didn’t work properly. While we visited in the summer, I can only imagine how inconvenient this would be in winter.

Again, I want to **emphasize that the staff was very courteous and helpful** — they are doing a commendable job with the resources available to them. The issues seem to be related to **infrastructure and maintenance**, which I hope the hotel management or higher authorities will address soon.

This place has great potential, but it urgently needs **renovation and better facilities** to truly offer a comfortable experience.

text.text:
**Disastrous Experience at Hotel Damson Plum**

My stay at Hotel Damson Plum was, without exaggeration, the worst hotel experience I have ever had. From the moment I arrived, I was met with unprofessional and indifferent staff at the front desk who seemed uninterested in guest concerns. The check-in process was unnecessarily slow and chaotic.

Upon entering my room, I was immediately disappointed by the lack of cleanliness. The bathroom had visible stains and a lingering unpleasant odor, and the towels provided were worn and scratchy. The bed linens appeared to be old and not properly laundered. Despite the hotel’s claim of modern amenities, I found the air conditioning barely functional and the Wi-Fi connection unreliable throughout my stay.

The noise from the hallway and adjacent rooms was constant, making it impossible to get a good night’s sleep. Housekeeping was inconsistent—some days my room was not cleaned at all, and when it was, it was done poorly.

The food quality in the restaurant was below par. The breakfast buffet was limited and lacked freshness, with several items running out quickly and not being replenished. Service in the restaurant was slow, and the staff seemed overwhelmed and inattentive.

The location, while near Lulu Mall, was not as convenient as advertised, and the area felt isolated at night. The hotel’s value for money is questionable given the poor quality of service and amenities.

Overall, I would strongly advise against staying at Hotel Damson Plum. There are much better options in Lucknow for a similar price, and this hotel did not live up to any of its promises.

The bed linens appeared to be old and not properly laundered. Despite the hotel’s claim of modern amenities, I found the air conditioning barely functional and the Wi-Fi connection unreliable throughout my stay.

The noise from the hallway and adjacent rooms was constant, making it impossible to get a good night’s sleep. Housekeeping was inconsistent—some days my room was not cleaned at all, and when it was, it was done poorly.

The food quality in the restaurant was below par. The breakfast buffet was limited and lacked freshness, with several items running out quickly and not being replenished. Service in the restaurant was slow, and the staff seemed overwhelmed and inattentive.

The location, while near Lulu Mall, was not as convenient as advertised, and the area felt isolated at night. The hotel’s value for money is questionable given the poor quality of service and amenities.

Overall, I would strongly advise against staying at Hotel Damson Plum. There are much better options in Lucknow for a similar price, and this hotel did not live up to any of its promises.

text.text:
The Taj Mahal Hotel in Lucknow, often referred to simply as Taj Mahal Lucknow, is a premier luxury hotel that has consistently received high praise from its guests. Located in the heart of Lucknow, the hotel combines traditional Indian hospitality with modern amenities, making it a preferred choice for both business and leisure travelers.

Historical Background

Originally opened in the mid-1990s, the hotel has undergone several transformations. It started as the Taj Residency before being rebranded as Vivanta, and finally, after a recent extensive renovation, it stands as the full-fledged Taj Mahal Hotel. This evolution reflects the hotel's commitment to maintaining high standards and adapting to the competitive landscape.

Rooms and Suites

The Taj Mahal Hotel, Lucknow, offers a range of accommodations, from standard rooms to opulent suites. Guests frequently highlight the impeccable cleanliness and comfort of the rooms. The suites, in particular, are noted for their spaciousness and luxurious touches. An upgrade to a suite often includes added perks such as complimentary meals and early check-in options, enhancing the overall guest experience.

Dining

The hotel boasts multiple dining options, each providing a unique culinary experience. The on-site restaurants serve a variety of cuisines, with particular praise for the quality of breakfast, lunch, and dinner offerings. Guests have singled out the morning flute music and the delicious jalebi as memorable aspects of their dining experience. In-room dining also receives high marks for its quality and convenience.

Facilities

The Taj Mahal Hotel, Lucknow, features a range of facilities designed to cater to the needs of its guests. The swimming pool and garden area provide a serene environment for relaxation and leisure. The hotel's gym, while functional, has received mixed reviews, with some guests noting issues with temperature control and equipment quality.

Service

One of the standout features of the Taj Mahal Hotel, Lucknow, is its exceptional service. Guests consistently praise the staff for their politeness, helpfulness, and attentiveness. From the reception to room service and luggage assistance, the staff’s commitment to guest satisfaction is evident. Specific employees are often mentioned by name in reviews, highlighting the personalized service that guests appreciate.

Areas for Improvement

While the overall feedback is overwhelmingly positive, there are occasional criticisms. Some guests have pointed out issues with the room temperature, finding it difficult to adjust the thermostat to a comfortable level. Additionally, the gym facilities have been described as basic and not up to the standard expected from a luxury hotel.

Summary

The Taj Mahal Hotel, Lucknow, stands out as one of the city’s finest luxury hotels, offering a blend of traditional elegance and modern convenience. Its strengths lie in its high-quality service, luxurious accommodations, and excellent dining options. Although there are minor areas for improvement, particularly regarding the gym and room temperature control, the overall guest experience is highly positive. The hotel's ability to create memorable stays through personalized service and attention to detail makes it a top choice for visitors to Lucknow.

For anyone planning to visit Lucknow, the Hotel promises a stay marked by luxury.

text.text:
Hyatt Regency Lucknow stands as a premier 5-star luxury hotel nestled in the heart of Uttar Pradesh. Strategically situated in the bustling central business district of Lucknow, it is conveniently located just a 30-minute drive from Chaudhary Charan Singh International Airport. The hotel is also a mere four minutes away from the High Court, as well as various corporate offices and vibrant shopping areas. With a total of 206 elegantly appointed rooms, including 19 luxurious suites, guests can enjoy stylish accommodations adorned with warm wood tones and subtle local design elements. Each room provides breathtaking views of either the city skyline or the serene pool area, ensuring a tranquil retreat for visitors. Guests can indulge in a delightful array of gourmet coffee and tea selections, alongside a tempting menu featuring sandwiches, light meals, freshly baked breads, savory snacks, and an assortment of cakes and pastries.

Positioned in the rapidly developing IT hub of Vibhuti Khand in Gomti Nagar, Hyatt Regency Lucknow serves as an ideal venue for various events, from large conferences and annual meetings to intimate board gatherings. The hotel also excels as a stunning wedding destination, where meticulous attention is given to every detail, ensuring that each celebration is unique and memorable. For added convenience, the hotel offers complimentary valet parking services, making it easy for guests to arrive and depart without hassle. The proximity to key transportation hubs, such as Chaudhary Charan Singh International Airport, located 25 kilometers away, and Lucknow Charbagh Railway Station, just 11.4 kilometers from the hotel, further enhances its appeal for both business and leisure travelers.

text.text:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at the Renaissance Hotel in Lucknow for a two-day visit, and I must say it was an exceptional experience from start to finish.

Upon arrival, I was greeted by friendly and attentive staff who made the check-in process smooth and effortless. The ambiance of the hotel lobby was elegant and inviting, setting the tone for a luxurious stay.

My room boasted stunning views of the city skyline and the molecular view, creating a captivating backdrop for my stay. Additionally, I enjoyed live music from my room, adding a delightful touch to the experience. The spaciousness and modern design of the room were particularly impressive, providing a comfortable and stylish retreat.

One of the highlights of my visit was spending time at the hotel's breathtaking swimming pool located on the top floor. The panoramic views combined with the serene atmosphere created a truly unforgettable experience. Whether taking a refreshing dip or simply lounging by the poolside, it was the perfect way to unwind after a busy day of exploring the city.

In addition to the outstanding facilities, the dining options at the hotel were also exceptional. From sumptuous breakfast spreads to gourmet dinners, the culinary offerings catered to every palate and exceeded all expectations.

Overall, my stay at the Renaissance Hotel in Lucknow was nothing short of exceptional. The combination of impeccable service, luxurious accommodations, stunning amenities, and the captivating top-floor swimming pool made it a truly memorable experience. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a five-star stay in the heart of Lucknow.

I recently had the pleasure of staying at the Holiday Inn Lucknow Airport, and I must say that it was an excellent experience from start to finish. The hotel's prime location near the Chaudhary Charan Singh International Airport made it an ideal choice for my business trip to Lucknow.

As soon as I arrived at the hotel, I was warmly greeted by the friendly staff, who efficiently checked me in and helped me with my luggage. The lobby area was modern and spacious, with a comfortable seating area where I could relax after a long flight.

My room was spacious and well-appointed, with a comfortable king-size bed, a large flat-screen TV, and a modern bathroom with all the necessary amenities. The room was also clean and well-maintained, with fresh towels and toiletries provided daily.

The hotel's amenities were top-notch, including a well-equipped gym, an outdoor pool, and a restaurant serving a variety of cuisines. The breakfast buffet was impressive, with a wide range of options including Indian and international dishes.

The hotel's staff were courteous and attentive throughout my stay, Ms.Supriya, Mr.Tanishq always willing to assist with any queries or requests I had. The hotel's location made it easy to get to the airport, and the hotel even offered a shuttle service to and from the airport.

Overall, I was thoroughly impressed with my stay at the Holiday Inn Lucknow Airport. The hotel's comfortable rooms, excellent amenities, and friendly staff made it an excellent choice for my business trip. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone traveling to Lucknow.

* Excellent location near the airport
* Friendly and attentive staff

* Impressive breakfast buffet

**Cons:**

* None!

If you're planning a business trip or leisure stay in Lucknow, I highly recommend the Holiday Inn Lucknow Airport. Its convenient location, comfortable rooms, and excellent amenities make it an ideal choice for travelers.

I recently hosted my son and daughter-in-law’s wedding reception at Lemon Tree Hotel, Lucknow, and it was an exceptional experience. The entire event was impeccably managed by the team, led by Saurav and Aruj, whose dedication and personal attention to every detail ensured its success. Their commitment to fulfilling even the smallest requirements was truly impressive and highly satisfying.

The Tangerine Hall is a stunning venue, and my guests were delighted with both the delicious food and the attentive service. The accommodations were equally outstanding, with elegantly designed and supremely comfortable guest rooms. Additionally, the hotel’s ample parking space was efficiently managed, making the event seamless for all attendees.

Their excellent location is another plus, ideally located close to the airport and on the Lucknow - Kanpur road right at the Shaheed Path crossing. The metro station being next door makes it easy to commute within Lucknow city if you don’t mind hopping on the metro for a quick and efficient ride.

Based on my personal experience, I highly recommend Lemon Tree Hotel, Lucknow, for hosting social events. Their professionalism and hospitality are truly commendable.

The Piccadily Hotel, Lucknow: Overview & Key Features

Location & Ambience

Located in Sector B, LDA Colony, Kanpur Road, just 5–10 minutes from the Lucknow airport and around 7 km from Hazratganj, the hotel offers easy access to both travel hubs and city shopping areas.

The entrance features a grand driveway leading into a plush lobby with royal décor and comfortable leather seating, creating a luxurious, welcoming vibe.

Rooms

The hotel offers a range of neat and spacious rooms:

Superior Twin/King, Executive Twin/King, Luxury Rooms, Suites, Luxury Suites, and a Presidential Suite (sizes ranging from ~30 sq m to 92 sq m), all with complimentary Wi-Fi.

Rooms are equipped with amenities like satellite TV, minibar, tea/coffee maker, electronic safe, direct-dial phone, and well-appointed bathrooms including hair dryers, in both standard and suite categories.

Front Office & Guest Services

The front office is known for its friendliness and efficiency—guests regularly praise staff members like Monika, Mudrika, Mahima, Mr. Pandey, and others for their warm hospitality and helpfulness during check-in and throughout the stay.

Additional services include airport/rail transfers, housekeeping, laundry, currency exchange, travel desk, doctor on call, salon, gym, spa, and more—all adding to a seamless stay experience.

Front Elevation & Aesthetic

The hotel's exterior is imposing and polished, backed by well-maintained grounds. The images show a stately façade in red brick tones, and a well-designed pool area that enhances its upscale character.

Security & Guardian

While explicit security staff details aren't highlighted in listings, the hotel’s reputation as a premium business-class property with 24-hour reception and organized services implies professional security protocols and a safe environment throughout.

Rooftop Garden / Venue Space

The hotel features a Terrace: an attractive outdoor venue suited for weddings and social events, accommodating up to **350 seated

text.text:
The Centrum Hotel in Lucknow is more than just a luxury hotel—it's an elegant landmark of modern hospitality nestled in the peaceful and prestigious neighborhood of Sushant Golf City. Spanning across a vast, lush landscape with meticulously maintained lawns and garden spaces, the hotel offers a serene escape from the city's hustle while maintaining seamless connectivity to major city landmarks. Located just off Shaheed Path, The Centrum provides quick access to the Chaudhary Charan Singh International Airport, the Lucknow Railway Station, and major commercial hubs like Gomti Nagar and Hazratganj. It's also in close proximity to renowned destinations like Ekana Cricket Stadium (ideal for sports lovers), Lulu Mall and Phoenix Palassio (for shopping enthusiasts), Medanta Hospital, and educational institutions, making it highly convenient for both leisure and business travelers. The hotel’s standout feature is its expansive layout and architecture—modern yet deeply rooted in Indian elegance—with interiors adorned with tasteful décor, large windows that welcome natural light, and a calm ambiance that reflects luxury at every step.

The Centrum boasts a wide range of accommodation options including Deluxe Rooms, Premium Rooms with balconies, Executive and Junior Suites offering separate living areas, the luxurious Centrum Suite with private lounges and dual bathrooms, and the opulent Centrum Villa that spans 721 sq ft of tailored, garden-facing elegance. All rooms are equipped with smart TVs, high-speed Wi-Fi, mini-bars, centralized AC, plush bedding, and thoughtfully curated furniture, ensuring the highest level of comfort. What truly sets The Centrum apart is its vast array of state-of-the-art facilities. Guests can rejuvenate at the semi-Olympic sized swimming pool, unwind at the full-service spa offering holistic wellness treatments, or work out at the high-tech fitness center with personal trainers available. For sports lovers, there are dedicated tennis and squash courts, a jogging track, and an indoor recreation zone with billiards, table tennis, and board games. For younger guests, there’s a vibrant kids’ play zone and a party area tailored for children’s celebrations. The hotel also features beautifully designed banquet halls, open-air lawns, and conference facilities equipped with modern audio-visual technology, ideal for weddings, corporate retreats, and large events.

Dining is a rich and diverse experience at The Centrum. The hotel hosts a range of culinary venues, including Plum, a multi-cuisine fine-dining restaurant offering everything from Indian delicacies to Japanese, Mediterranean, Italian, and local Awadhi cuisines, and Pendulum Bar, which provides a stylish, cozy space for enjoying premium drinks and handcrafted cocktails. Room service is available 24/7, with chefs happy to customize dishes according to dietary preferences. Additional conveniences include ample and secure parking space, 24-hour concierge and front desk service, electric vehicle charging stations, on-call doctors, business centers, currency exchange, travel desk services, and express laundry and dry cleaning.

Above all, the hotel is known for its incredibly warm, professional, and detail-oriented staff. Guests consistently praise the team for going above and beyond—from quick check-ins and personalized welcome gestures to prompt room service and courteous behavior throughout the stay. The management places great emphasis on guest satisfaction, often checking in personally to ensure comfort, making business travelers, couples, families, and even solo guests feel completely at home. In online reviews across platforms like TripAdvisor, Google, and Yatra, The Centrum maintains an impressive rating (around 4.4/5), with particular praise for its cleanliness, food quality, staff attentiveness, and peaceful atmosphere. In short, The Centrum Hotel is not just a place to stay—it's an experience designed with elegance, comfort, and heartfelt hospitality, making it one of the finest hospitality destinations in Lucknow for travelers who seek excell

text.text:
Review: The Centrum Hotel, Lucknow

Rating: ★★★★★ (5/5)

I recently had the pleasure of staying at The Centrum Hotel in Lucknow, and I can confidently say that it is a top-notch establishment that exceeded my expectations in every way. From the moment I stepped into the hotel, I was greeted with warm hospitality and a sense of luxury that continued throughout my stay.

The Centrum Hotel boasts a modern and sophisticated ambiance that creates a welcoming and comfortable atmosphere. The lobby area is beautifully designed, and the attention to detail is evident in the elegant decor and stylish furnishings. The hotel's aesthetics are a perfect blend of contemporary design and traditional elements, giving it a unique charm.

The rooms at The Centrum Hotel are spacious, well-appointed, and equipped with all the modern amenities one could ask for. The comfortable beds, plush linens, and tasteful decor provided a relaxing haven after a long day of exploring the city. The room's cleanliness and attention to detail were impeccable, ensuring a comfortable and enjoyable stay.

The staff at The Centrum Hotel were exceptional in their service and attentiveness. They were professional, friendly, and went above and beyond to ensure that all my needs were met. From the front desk to the restaurant staff, everyone was dedicated to providing the highest level of hospitality, making me feel like a valued guest throughout my stay.

The hotel's dining options were outstanding, offering a range of delectable dishes prepared by talented chefs. The breakfast buffet was extensive, featuring a variety of fresh and delicious items to suit all tastes. The restaurant's ambiance was inviting, and the attentive staff provided excellent service, making dining a truly enjoyable experience.

The Centrum Hotel also offers excellent facilities, including a well-equipped fitness center and a rooftop pool. The fitness center had modern equipment and provided a great space for a workout. The rooftop pool offered a stunning view of the city and was a perfect spot to relax and unwind.

The location of The Centrum Hotel is another advantage. It is conveniently situated in a prime area of Lucknow, close to major attractions, shopping centers, and transportation hubs. This made it easy for me to explore the city and enjoy the local sights and sounds.

In conclusion, The Centrum Hotel in Lucknow is a five-star establishment that provides an exceptional experience from start to finish. With its stylish ambiance, luxurious rooms, attentive staff, delectable dining options, and excellent facilities, it offers everything one could desire for a memorable stay. I highly recommend The Centrum Hotel to anyone visiting Lucknow and seeking a truly elevated hotel experience.

text.text:
The hotel is conveniently located at Lucknow Airport's T3 terminal, with the metro station just a short walk away—perfect for transit travelers. The room is clean, spacious, and well-maintained, as you'd expect from a quality hotel. However, a minor downside is that the hotel is located underground, so there’s no natural sunlight, making it hard to tell if it’s day or night. This might actually be a plus for those traveling across time zones, though!
The restaurant wasn’t in full swing during my stay, likely because the hotel is still new and just starting to get everything up and running. Hopefully, it’ll be fully functional soon!

text.text: I had the pleasure of staying at Regenta Central Lucknow last weekend, and it was truly a memorable experience. Whether you’re in town for business, leisure, or just passing through, this hotel has everything to offer for a comfortable and satisfying stay. The rooms were spacious, modern, and impeccably clean. The décor had a pleasant mix of traditional Lucknawi touches with contemporary comfort. My room had a fantastic view of the city, and the plush bedding ensured I had a restful night. The amenities provided were top-notch, including fast Wi-Fi, a well-stocked minibar, and a spacious bathroom with luxurious toiletries. The service at Regenta Central was exceptional. From the moment I arrived, the staff was warm, welcoming, and always attentive to my needs. Whether it was at the front desk or room service, I was consistently impressed by their professionalism and willingness to go the extra mile to ensure a pleasant stay.

text.text:
**Title: A Haven of Tranquility: Damson Plum Delight**

From the moment we stepped into the welcoming embrace of Damson Plum, we knew our stay would be extraordinary. Every aspect of this hotel is meticulously designed to create an atmosphere of tranquility and comfort.

The rooms are elegantly furnished, offering a perfect blend of modern amenities and cozy charm. The plush beds envelop you in luxury, ensuring a restful night's sleep. And the breathtaking views from our window made waking up a joy every morning.

The staff at Damson Plum exemplify hospitality at its finest. From the warm greeting at check-in to the attentive service throughout our stay, they went above and beyond to ensure our comfort and satisfaction. Special mention to the concierge team who were invaluable in helping us navigate the city and discover hidden gems.

Dining at Damson Plum was an experience in itself. The restaurant boasts a diverse menu of exquisite dishes, each prepared with fresh, locally sourced ingredients. Whether indulging in breakfast overlooking the tranquil garden or enjoying a romantic dinner by candlelight, every meal was a culinary delight.

The hotel's facilities are second to none. The spa offers a sanctuary of relaxation, with a range of treatments to rejuvenate both body and mind. And the fitness center is equipped with state-of-the-art equipment, perfect for maintaining your wellness routine while traveling.

Overall, our stay at Damson Plum exceeded all expectations. From the impeccable service to the luxurious accommodations, every moment was a delight. We can't wait to return and experience the magic of Damson Plum once again. Highly recommended for anyone seeking an unforgettable getaway.
